name: Findifeira
description:
Findifeira is a Survival round based Top-Down Shooter

You are a healthy Fruit that by mistake was thrown away with the rotten ones at the end of a street fair. You need to survive the waves of putrefied enemies and find a way out, colecting keys for a dor that takes you to freedom. 

The game, include 2 modes:

-Mission: collect 3 keys and find the exit before the horde of enemys grow to a gigantic number.

-Survival : Survive if you can,  up to 25 waves of enemys, enemys drop health pickups. and spawn in large numbers.
